channel.title: VTRS on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in VTRS on FinanClub

item.title: 1076 VTRS
item.description: score:1076 Chances: Viatris has the potential to be a great dividend holding due to its decently high dividend yield, stable line of business, and disruption-resistant business model. The launch of Breyna™, the first generic version of AstraZeneca’s Symbicort®, could potentially contribute to Viatris’ revenue and growth in the healthcare sector.
